title: List of all Androidthird party libraries in  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidthird party libraries in  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: LicensesDialog
repoList.description: LicensesDialog is an open source library to display licenses of third-party libraries in an Android app.

repoList.name: NoLibrary-Page-Indicators
repoList.description: A little hack to make circular/dot indicators for your view pagers in your Android projects without the use of third party libraries

repoList.name: SimpleEncryptionLib
repoList.description: A free, open source , third party Android library for encryption and decryption of strings in Android apps and PC Java applications. It is 100% compatible with Kotlin and Java applications.
